usefulItems: baking paper, square baking tin (20 cm), freezer-proof container, freezer
title: Raw Chocolate, Raspberry and Macadamia Bars

ingredients.content: 20 g desiccated coconut, plus extra for sprinkling

preparations.content: Line a square baking tin (20 cm) with baking paper.

Place dates, macadamia nuts, coconut oil and cacao powder in mixing bowl then mix <b>20 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to prepared tin, smooth over with spatula then place in freezer for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl.
After freezing time, place cashews in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add raspberries, honey, desiccated coconut and coconut oil then mix <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to tin and smooth over base layer with spatula. Place in freezer for 2-4 hours until firm. Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl.
After freezing time, place coconut oil in mixing bowl and melt <b>2 min/90°C/speed 2<b>.
Add honey and cacao powder then mix <b>10 sec/90°C/speed 3<b>. Transfer to tin and smooth over with spatula. Place in freezer for 15 minutes then remove and slice into 16 squares.
Store in a freezer-proof container in freezer until needed, sprinkling with extra desiccated coconut before serving.

hintsAndTricks: For a vegan instead of a raw version, substitute raw honey with maple syrup.
